src_original: atha sa rājā kenacit kālāntareṇa sarvasacivān uvāca /
vividhānāṃ prāṇināṃ śirobhiḥ kāryaṃ /  tattvamamukasya prāṇinaḥ śīrṣamānaya tvamamukasyeti /  yaśo 'mātyaḥ punarājñaptastvaṃ mānuṣaṃ śīrṣamānayeti /
tgt_original: 各令推覓百獸之頭。 唯使夜奢獨求人首。 即受王命咸皆推覓。 既得之已悉來奉王。

src_original: rājāha / rādhagupta,
nāhaṃ dravyavināśaṃ na rājyanāśanaṃ na cāśrayaviyogaṃ śocāmi /
kintu śocāmi,  āryairyad,  viprayokṣyāmi /
saṃpūjayiṣyāmi varānnapānair etad vicintyāśruvimokṣaṇaṃ me //
tato rājñāśokena catasraḥ koṭīḥ paripurayiṣyāmīti hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ kukkuṭārāmaṃ preṣayitumārabdhaḥ /
tgt_original: 阿恕伽王即以七寶施雞頭末寺。

src_original: tasmiṃśca samaye kunālasya saṃpadī nāma putro yuvarājye pravartate /
tgt_original: 立拘那羅子式摩提以為太子。

src_original: tasyāmātyair abhihitaṃ /
kumāra aśoko rājā svalpakālavasthāyī /  (A-av 128) idaṃ ca dravyaṃ kukkuṭārāmaṃ preṣyate /
tgt_original: 阿恕伽王命臨欲終散諸庫藏。 汝若紹位無所資用。

src_original: yāvatkumāreṇa bhāṇḍāgārikaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ /  yadā rājño 'śokasyāpratiṣiddhā [sampat] tasya suvarṇabhājane āhāramupanāmyate /
tgt_original: 時式摩提信受邪說。 以一金盤為王送食。

src_original: bhuktvā tāni suvarṇabhājanāni kukkuṭārāmaṃ preṣayati /  tasya suvarṇabhājanaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ /  tānyapi kukkuṭārāmaṃ preṣayati /  tato rūpyabhājanamapi pratiṣiddhaṃ /
tasya yāvan mṛbhdājana āhāramupanāmyate /  tasmiṃśca samaye rājño 'śokasyārdhāmalakaṃ karāntaragataṃ /
tgt_original: 後以瓦器半菴摩勒持與王食。

src_original: atha rājāśokaḥ saṃvignaḥ amātyān paurāṃśca saṃnipātya kathayati /
kaḥ sāmprataṃ pṛthivyāmīśvaraḥ /
samānīteṣu ca śīraḥsvabhihitāḥ /  gacchatemāni śirāṃsi mūlyena vikrīṇidhvamiti /  atha sarvaśirāṃsi vikrītāni /  tadeva mānuṣaṃ śiro na kaścij (A-av 72) jagrāha /  tato rājñābhihitaḥ /
vināpi mūlyena kasmaicid etacchiro dehiti /  na cāsya kaścit pratigrāhako babhūva /
tgt_original: 未幾時間諸頭並售。 夜奢人頭都無買者。

src_original: na khalvāryasya kaścit paścācchramaṇaṃ /
sthavira uvāca /
jarādharmāṇāṃ kuto 'smākaṃ paścācchramaṇo bhavati /  yadi kecicchraddhāpurogeṇa (A-av 6)  pravrajanti,  te 'smākaṃ paścācchramaṇā bhavanti /
tgt_original: 我無俸祿有信出家乃見隨耳。

src_original: gupto gāndhika uvāca /
āryāhaṃ tāvad gṛhavāse parigṛddho viṣayābhirataśca /  na mayā śakyaṃ pravrajituṃ /
api tu yo 'smākaṃ putro bhavati taṃ vayamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṃ dāsyāmaḥ /
sthavira uvāca /
yāvad guptasya gāndhikasya putro jātaḥ /  tasyāśvagupta iti nāmadheya kṛtaṃ /
tgt_original: 後生一子名阿失波毱多。

src_original: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā sthaviraśāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamadhigamyovāca /  vatsa tvayā pratijñātaṃ yo 'smākaṃ putro bhaviṣyati taṃ vayamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṃ dāsyāmaḥ /  ayaṃ ca putro jātaḥ /  anujānīhi pravrājayiṣyāmīti /  gāndhika uvāca /
gṛhītvā coktaḥ /  iha te nidhanamupasaṃgantavyamiti /
vistareṇa kāryaṃ /  tato bhikṣuḥ śokārto vāṣpakaṇṭhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
tenocyate /
kimidaṃ bāladāraka iva rudasīti /
sa bhikṣuḥ prāha /
na śarīravināśaṃ hi bhadra śocāmi sarvaśaḥ /  mokṣadharmāntarāyaṃ tu śocāmi bhṛśamātmanaḥ //
tgt_original: 我不畏死為善利耳。 吾始出家未證道味。

src_original: durlabhaṃ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ pravrajyāṃ ca sukhodayāṃ /
tenocyate / dattavaro 'haṃ nṛpatinā /  dhīro bhava /  nāsti te mokṣa iti /
tgt_original: 王先有教。 入此獄者終不聽出。

src_original: tataḥ sakaruṇairvacanaistaṃ bhikṣuḥ kramaṃ yācati sma /
māsaṃ yāvat /  saptarātramanujñātaḥ /  sa khalu maraṇabhayodvignahṛdayaḥ saptarātreṇa me na bhavitavyamiti vyāyamamatiḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
tgt_original: 我今定死願赦七日當就刑戮。 爾時獄卒尋聽許之。

src_original: atha saptame divase aśokasya rājño 'ntaḥpurikā kumāreṇa saha saṃraktāṃ nirīkṣyamāṇāṃ saṃlapantīṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sahadarśanādeva ruṣitena (A-av 48)
tgt_original: 阿恕伽王宮中婇女。 與他男子共相調戲。

src_original: rājñā tau dvāvapi taṃ cārakamanupreṣitau /
tatra mūśalairayodroṇyāmasthyavaśeṣau kṛtau /
tgt_original: 尋以鐵杵碎之如塵。 骨肉分散猶如聚沫。

src_original: tasya karmaṇo vipākenoccakula upapannaḥ /
tgt_original: 由斯業故生尊貴家得淨妙果。

src_original: yaśo 'mātyopākhyānaṃ  sa idānīmacirajātaprasādo buddhāśāsane yatra śākyaputrīyān dadarśa,
tgt_original: 皆捨重擔咸離生死。 王之信心深遠難量。

src_original: ākīrṇe rahasi vā tatra śirasā pādayornipatya vandate sma /
tgt_original: 見諸沙門若長若幼。 皆迎問訊恭敬為禮。

src_original: tasya ca yaśo nāmāmātyaḥ paramaśrāddho bhagavati /
tgt_original: 時有一臣名曰夜奢。 無信敬心邪見熾盛。

src_original: sa taṃ rājānamuvāca /  deva nārhasi sarvarṇapravrajitānāṃ praṇipātaṃ kartuṃ /  santi hi śākyaśrāmaṇerakāścaturbhyo varṇebhyaḥ pravrajitā iti /  tasya rājā na kiṃcidavocad /
tgt_original: 阿恕伽王甚無智慧。 自屈貴德禮拜童幼。
